name: @smui-extra/site
description: SMUI Website (You're not meant to install this.)

scripts.theme: npm run theme-smui && npm run theme-bubblegum && npm run theme-fixation && npm run theme-material && npm run theme-metro && npm run theme-unity
scripts.theme-smui: npm run smui-theme-light && npm run smui-theme-dark && npm run site-light && npm run site-dark
scripts.theme-bubblegum: npm run smui-bubblegum-light && npm run smui-bubblegum-dark && npm run site-bubblegum-light && npm run site-bubblegum-dark
scripts.theme-fixation: npm run smui-fixation-light && npm run smui-fixation-dark && npm run site-fixation-light && npm run site-fixation-dark
scripts.theme-material: npm run smui-material-light && npm run smui-material-dark && npm run site-material-light && npm run site-material-dark
scripts.theme-metro: npm run smui-metro-light && npm run smui-metro-dark && npm run site-metro-light && npm run site-metro-dark
scripts.theme-unity: npm run smui-unity-light && npm run smui-unity-dark && npm run site-unity-light && npm run site-unity-dark
scripts.smui-theme-light: smui-theme compile static/smui.css -s expanded -i src/theme -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-theme-dark: smui-theme compile static/smui-dark.css -s expanded -i src/theme/dark -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-bubblegum-light: smui-theme compile static/smui-bubblegum.css -s expanded -i src/theme/bubblegum -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-bubblegum-dark: smui-theme compile static/smui-bubblegum-dark.css -s expanded -i src/theme/bubblegum-dark -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-fixation-light: smui-theme compile static/smui-fixation.css -s expanded -i src/theme/fixation -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-fixation-dark: smui-theme compile static/smui-fixation-dark.css -s expanded -i src/theme/fixation-dark -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-material-light: smui-theme compile static/smui-material.css -s expanded -i src/theme/material -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-material-dark: smui-theme compile static/smui-material-dark.css -s expanded -i src/theme/material-dark -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-metro-light: smui-theme compile static/smui-metro.css -s expanded -i src/theme/metro -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-metro-dark: smui-theme compile static/smui-metro-dark.css -s expanded -i src/theme/metro-dark -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-unity-light: smui-theme compile static/smui-unity.css -s expanded -i src/theme/unity -i node_modules/
scripts.smui-unity-dark: smui-theme compile static/smui-unity-dark.css -s expanded -i src/theme/unity-dark -i node_modules/

author: Hunter Perrin <hperrin@gmail.com>
